title: 88.Minutes.2007.WS.DVDRiP.XViD-RCDiVX
description:
Release name: 88.Minutes.2007.WS.DVDRiP.XViD-RCDiVX

Title: 88 Minutes

Source: Region 2 PAL retail
Release date: 16-03-2008
Store date: 18-03-2008
Theater date: 18-04-2008 (US

Genre: Crime
IMDB link: <a href="
http://us.imdb.com/title/tt0411061" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://us.imdb.com/title/tt0411061</a>
IMDB rating: 6.3 (8865 votes

Resolution: 640x272 (2.35
Audio bitrate: 384 kbit AC3
Video bitrate cd1: 1489 kbit AVG
Video bitrate cd1: 1364 kbit AVG

Audio: English
Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Icelandic
Playtime: 107 min

Notes

First of all thanks to Geeks for letting me use their source

TDL released this with an AR of 1:1.82. This one from the R2 retail has
an AR of 1:2.35. The TDL sample is of course included in the Sample
folder

This movie does not have any US/UK screens yet, so some might say
that it should be tagged STV. However this is the facts

This link shows that the movie will hit US theaters on 18/4-2008 <a href="
http://www.boxofficemojo.com/search/?q88&p.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.boxofficemojo.com/search/?q88&p.htm</a>

On the Sony Pictures homepage it is also clearly stated that it will hit
US theaters on 18/4-2008 <a href="
http://www.sonypictures.com/movies/88minutes" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.sonypictures.com/movies/88minutes</a>

Outside of the US it has earned more than 3 million  in theaters

If some still think that it should be tagged as STV be my guest and nuke
it with whatever reason you want
